pkgmetadata.longdescription: # tentaclio-databricksA package containing all the dependencies for the `databricks+thrift` tentaclio schema .## Quick StartThis project comes with a `Makefile` which is ready to do basic common tasks```$ make helpinstall Initalise the virtual env installing depsclean Remove all the unwanted clutterlock Lock dependenciesupdate Update dependencies (whole tree)sync Install dependencies as per the lock filelint Lint files with flake and mypyformat Run black and isorttest Run unit testscircleci Validate circleci configuration (needs circleci cli)```## Configuring access to DatabricksYour connection url should be in the following format:```databricks+thrift://<token>@<host>?HTTPPath=<http_path>```Example values:- token: dapi1213456789abc- host: myhost.databricks.com- http_path: /sql/1.0/endpoints/123456789
